bug.description: HI, The instructions for TX2 installation is not accessible: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/CMU-Perceptual-Computing-Lab/openpose/blob/master/doc/installation_jetson_tx2>https://github.com/CMU-Perceptual-Computing-Lab/openpose/blob/master/doc/installation_jetson_tx2</denchmark-link>

comments.comment: It's <denchmark-link:https://github.com/CMU-Perceptual-Computing-Lab/openpose/blob/master/doc/installation_jetson_tx2.md>https://github.com/CMU-Perceptual-Computing-Lab/openpose/blob/master/doc/installation_jetson_tx2.md</denchmark-link> (I forgot the .md) I'll update it very soon. Thanks!
Thanks, I am running on my JETSON TX2 board, it works!
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/robotlinker>@robotlinker</denchmark-link> what kind of performance are you getting (FPS) for body only and at which resolution? Thx!
